channel.title: I need some help Adding custom items

item.title: I need some help Adding custom items
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

When i create custom items i always get an error like this one

this makes me mad very single time i make a custom item i made a dragon platebody v.1 and i cant put the item into my server that picture is what the platebody looks like equiped that ugly rock thing and it equips it as a weapon not platebody please help me. here is my codeâ€¦

if(i == 12222) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 12222; //Model invent/drop id class8.anInt181 = 1000; //Model zoom (decrease to zoom in) class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 12222; //Model wield id (male) class8.anInt200 = 12222; //Model wield id (female) class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon PlateBody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Ancient PlateBody".getBytes(); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2009, 02:32:06 pm[/size][hr]help please!

Read full topic
